system.levelAdaptation:
After level 5: +D6 damage, +1 Armor (all Hit Locations)

After level 10: +5 Health, +D6 damage, +10 Combat Skill

actions.name: Inferno Rain (Magical)
actions.description: The Infernal Tormentor conjures a storm of molten projectiles that rain down upon all characters. Each creature in the room must make a Dodge check, taking 2D4 Infernal damage on a failed check, or half as much on a successful one.

actions.name: Burning Grasp (Physical)
actions.description: The Infernal Tormentor reaches out with its fiery claws, making a melee attack that deals D8 Infernal damage. The target must make an Athletics check or be grappled by the Tormentor's burning grasp, becoming Restrained. The target takes 1 Fire damage at the start of each of its turns while grappled.

actions.name: Infernal Shapechange
actions.description: The Infernal Tormentor shifts its form, becoming Immune to Fire damage and Resistant to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage for 2 rounds.

actions.name: Fiery Eruption (Magical)
actions.description: The Infernal Tormentor releases a burst of fiery energy, creating a cone of searing flames in front of it. Each creature in the room must make a Dodge check, taking 3D4 Fire damage on a failed check, or half as much on a successful one.

actions.name: Infernal Wrath (Physical)
actions.description: The Infernal Tormentor channels its rage into a single devastating attack. On a hit, the target takes 2D6 Infernal damage and is knocked Prone.

actions.name: Hellfire Nova (Magical)
actions.description: The Infernal Tormentor unleashes a nova of hellfire, engulfing everything within the room. Each creature must make a Dodge check, taking D8 Fire + D4 Infernal damage on a failed check, or half as much on a successful one.

system.description: The Infernal Tormentor is a malevolent entity of raging flames and smoldering fury that stands as an embodiment of the infernal planes. With an ever-shifting form that mirror the intensity of its inner fire, this Overseer scorches the battlefield with searing fire-based assaults, conjuring molten projectiles that rain down upon foes. Its unbridled fury allows it to unleash devastating melee strikes that cleave through armor and courage alike.
